name: Equity Funds
description: Equity funds primarily invest in stocks or equity securities.

children.name: Large-cap Funds
children.description: Large-cap funds invest primarily in companies with large market capitalization.

children.name: Mid-cap Funds
children.description: Mid-cap funds invest in companies with medium-sized market capitalization.
examples: Aditya Birla Sun Life Mid Cap Fund

children.name: Small-cap Funds
children.description: Small-cap funds invest in companies with small market capitalization.

name: Debt Funds
description: Debt funds primarily invest in fixed-income securities such as bonds and treasury bills.

children.name: Liquid Funds
children.description: Liquid funds invest in very short-term market instruments with high liquidity.
examples: Aditya Birla Sun Life Liquid Fund

children.name: Income Funds
children.description: Income funds invest in fixed-income securities with an objective to generate regular income.

children.name: Gilt Funds
children.description: Gilt funds primarily invest in government securities.

name: Hybrid Funds
description: Hybrid funds invest in a mix of equities and debt instruments.

children.name: Balanced Funds
children.description: Balanced funds maintain a balanced portfolio of stocks and bonds.

children.name: Arbitrage Funds
children.description: Arbitrage funds exploit price differentials in different markets to generate returns.

name: Index Funds
description: Index funds replicate the performance of a specific market index.

children.name: Balanced Funds
children.description: Balanced funds maintain a balanced portfolio of stocks and bonds.
examples: Aditya Birla Sun Life Index Fund
